Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match against Bangladesh by five wickets.
Shaheen Afridi took four wickets, his best performance of the tournament so far.
Babar Azam and Mohammed Rizwan put on 57 for the first wicket.
Mohammed Haris played a cameo worth 31 from 18 balls.
Shan Masood provided the cool head when required, clipping the two runs needed to seal the win.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was effectively a quarter-final, with the winner advancing to the semi-finals.
Bangladesh were limited to 127 for eight from their 20 overs.
Taskin Ahmed was impressive with the new ball but was let down by his colleagues' fielding.
